hero.title: Synapse Building Cloud
hero.subtitle: Monitor, simulate and control BACnet, KNX, Modbus and MQTT devices
hero.description: Modular full-stack platform that bridges traditional Building Management Systems with modern cloud technologies. Real-time visualization, device control and 3D digital twin.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage smart buildings the modern way

gateway.title: Multi-Protocol Gateway
gateway.description: Native support for BACnet/IP, Modbus TCP, KNX (simulated or live) with extensible integrations

dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
dashboard.description: Visualize, control and trend building points in real time

digitalTwin.title: 3D Digital Twin
digitalTwin.description: Interactive floor plan built with React and Three.js for immersive visualizations

mqtt.title: MQTT / REST API Layer
mqtt.description: IoT and cloud integration via REST API and MQTT messaging

rbac.title: Role-Based Access Control
rbac.description: Secure authentication and authorization via BetterAuth

docker.title: Docker-Ready
docker.description: Easily deploy on CapRover or local environment with Docker Compose

protocols.title: Supported Protocols
protocols.subtitle: Native connectivity with major building automation protocols

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Planned milestones to bring the platform to the next level

phase1.title: Core Platform & Visual Dashboard
phase1.description: Base UI, authentication, device management and real-time dashboard

phase2.title: BACnet Integration
phase2.description: Complete BACnet/IP gateway with discovery, point read/write and trending

phase3.title: Modbus & KNX Gateway
phase3.description: Support for Modbus TCP and KNX protocol with device simulators

phase4.title: Digital Twin Visualization
phase4.description: Interactive 3D visualization with Three.js and real-time data representation

phase5.title: Cloud Integration & Analytics
phase5.description: InfluxDB for historical data, Grafana for analytics and production-ready deployment

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Built with modern web technologies for scalability and maintainability
